Patch Set 10: Code-Review-1

(1 comment)

I'm repeating Stuart's words. Would you mind explaining why we don't leverage olso.db.api.wrap_db_retry? Please correct me if I missed anything. Thanks for working on this.

http://docs.openstack.org/developer/oslo.db/api/oslo.db.api.html#oslo.db.api.wrap_db_retry

Patch Set 10:

Hi Fei Long, thanks for the review. As far as I know from talking to oslo.db people, that decorator isn't currently used anywhere in openstack, so the decision was to simply extend the current retry mechanism to catch DBConnectionError as well as DBDeadlock errors. The original decorator which shipped in Juno wasn't configurable, either.
